summary: A group of friends go on a roadtrip and come to a stop in a forest where legend has it a group of naked bisexual female monsters lurk. Will they awake them? And if so will they survive?
cast: Tom Savini|Daniel Maclagan|Nicole Petty|Sophie Holland|Richard Cambridge|David Hood|Francesca Kingdon|Steve Hart|Dan van Husen|Shaun Hutson|Marysia Kay|Eleanor James|Cleo Mason|Hana Urushima|Charlotte Hunter|Samantha Brooks|Mike Hannides
title: El bosque de los malditos
